insert: insert into order( mem_idx, order_no, order_status, total_amount, order_name, order_mem_name, order_phone, order_postal, order_address, order_address_more, order_time ) values ( #{mem_idx}, #{order_no}, '결제대기', #{total_amount}, #{order_name}, #{order_mem_name}, #{order_phone}, #{order_postal}, #{order_address}, #{order_address_more}, now() )
